snippet: A rare Lalique glass radiator ornament surfaced unexpectedly in an auction catalog last year. At the November auction, bidding quickly outpaced the piece's estimate of $100 to $150.
abstract: A rare Lalique glass radiator ornament surfaced unexpectedly in an auction catalog last year. At the November auction, bidding quickly outpaced the piece's estimate of $100 to $150.

headline.main: A Fox Hunt, With a $205,000 Prize
